eventName: So Long, Adele: Home Away From Home
storyInfo: The Little Black Sheep invite Eyjafjalla to their party. After the dreamy night, Bison is shocked to discover that his supplies have been completely ruined.

attributes.content: Found it?
attributes.name: Agitated Creature

attributes.content: Found it, found it.
attributes.name: Dozy Creature

attributes.content: Found it when the fowlbeast was singing.
attributes.name: Dozy Creature

attributes.content: How's the weather today?
attributes.name: Agitated Creature

attributes.content: All good until the bad happens.
attributes.name: Dozy Creature

attributes.content: Time is of the essence. Our party is about to begin.
attributes.name: Agitated Creature

attributes.content: Baa, why did you only arrive just now?
attributes.name: Agitated Creature

attributes.content: Me?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Say no more. I can tell at a glance that you're different from the other mediocre people.
attributes.name: Agitated Creature

attributes.content: I suggest you join our grand plan.
attributes.name: Agitated Creature

attributes.content: Grand plan? What are you going to do?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Where am I... And why am I wearing Mutti's clothes?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: We will find what we like most, carry it on our backs, and never take it off again.
attributes.name: Agitated Creature

attributes.content: It is so very heavy, so heavy that I won't be able to straighten my back, but it is very important!
attributes.name: Dozy Creature

attributes.content: Why do you have nothing on your back?
attributes.name: Agitated Creature

attributes.content: No, no, she does have it on her back!
attributes.name: Dozy Creature

attributes.content: Good evening, child. Did you hear the bell?
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Bell? No... But that might be because I can't hear very well most of the time...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Then, you should also come and join our party.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Where is it?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: When next the bell rings, at the end of the world.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: But before that, I have something to show you.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Mmhmm. It looks like my memory is correct.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: These stones, specimens, and red-colored photos. These are what you've been brought here to see.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: The gentle creature walks forward with light footsteps.
Look, these rocks have been alive for thousands, tens of thousands of years. They were buried here, deep beneath the ground, long before even we were here.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: They are so beautiful, so passionate. Though they were deep underground, hundreds of miles apart, they eventually came together and brought forth a marvelous eruption.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: You love them, don't you?
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Volcanoes? I do...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Volcanoes or rocks, they are all very precious treasures.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: But, my dear Adele...
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: What if someone used them to do bad things? What would you do?
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Bad things? Like what?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: A pretty nice party it was ♪
attributes.name: Agitated Creature

attributes.content: A pretty nice party it'll be ♪
attributes.name: Dozy Creature

attributes.content: The North Wind we've found, we've found ♪
attributes.name: Agitated Creature

attributes.content: But where are the seeds in the ground, the ground ♪
attributes.name: Dozy Creature

attributes.content: Oh, the party's about to begin.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Adele, would you like to bring a rock to the party?
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Then, let us make haste.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: What's wrong? What's on your mind?
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Um... I'm sorry to say this, but I...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Little Black Sheep... Are you Mr. Dolly?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: I am Dolly, but I am also not Dolly.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Who I am depends on what I am in your mind.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: There are some differences between you and Mr. Dolly.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Are all of those... Little Black Sheep?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: No, no. We cannot say 'all.' Each and every one is unique, as is their connection to the world.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Just as we refer to you, we would not call all of them 'Adele.'
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Every 'Adele' is unique.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: So, why did you invite me here?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Because of the North Wind.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Because we wished to share the joys of harvest. Every participant in this party has been chosen.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Including you, my dear Adele.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: The things I've experienced the last few days have truly been mind-boggling.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: That, too, is a part of life.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Are you happy right now, little one?
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: I don't know...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Let me take a look. I believe you are...
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: ...not very happy right now.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Look over there. She is the proof.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: The Little Black Sheep look down from atop the chest.
A tiny, fragile creature tries to jump up – once, twice... Try as it might, it cannot jump onto the chest.
Hrmm...
attributes.name: Tiny Creature

attributes.content: Is it alone?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: She looks very weak right now. Too weak to jump.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Can we help her out?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Not right now.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Only when the volcano erupts will she become herself.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Is she also one of your kind?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Yes. Eventually, everyone will become one of us.
attributes.name: Gentle Creature

attributes.content: Mornin', Adele. Would you like some breakfast?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Why do you look so tired? Want me to make you a cup of coffee?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Good morning...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: I seem to have had a really long and strange dream last night, and I'm still a bit out of it.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: You know what they say around here? The emotions that overflow too much during the day are left over for you to savor in your dreams at night.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: What was the dream about again? I seem to remember something about it being very noisy and lively...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: It's true! I really saw it all!
attributes.name: Excited Girl

attributes.content: Yes, yes. I believe you.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: And because of that, you're not allowed to have ice cream for two months for sneaking out of your room and midnight and sneaking over to the land by the sea.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: Aww...
attributes.name: Ice Cream-Craving Girl

attributes.content: But, I saw a little lamb run into my room last night, and it took me to a place where there were a whole bunch of other lambs...
attributes.name: Indignant Girl

attributes.content: There were a whole bunch of lambs, as fluffy as marshmallows, singing and dancing on top of a chest...
attributes.name: Indignant Girl

attributes.content: If what you say is true, a flock of sheep invited you to join their midnight party.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: Yeah, I think that makes sense. Because I've been a good girl...
attributes.name: Indignant Girl

attributes.content: A complete mess.
Up until yesterday, specialty products from various countries shipped by MountainDash Logistics had all been stockpiled here.
If nothing unexpected happened, they would have appeared at the trade fair in a few days to show the tourist city what the outside world looked like.
But now, there are overturned shelves everywhere the eye can see, goods strewn haphazardly across the ground, dusty footprints stamped atop some of them.
How... did this happen...?
attributes.name: Bison
